name: Spaghetti Code
long_description: A sticky sloppy mess of code swirls around your body immobilizing you in a small cramped space where you can barely see anything except a few black and white binary blinks and a couple of oozing corrupted files.
short_description: A swirl of spaghetti code with binary blinks and some majorly harshed files.

room_features.name: Binary Files
room_features.description: '01000101111001Mr.Robot1100010' So THAT'S who's behind all this!
room_features.description_hacked: These binary files have been hacked into bits.

room_features.name: Corrupted Files
room_features.description_hacked: ... yea, next time, you will probably want to use VirtualSandbox3.0. Those were almost as corrupt as EvilCorp Bank!

room_connections.label: Data Tower
room_connections.description: spooky looking tower of bits and bytes
